```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(mlr)

train <- read.csv("Treasury Recovery Act Data as of 9-30-2010.csv")
train
```

```{r}
columns<-colnames(train)
columns
```
```{r}
toNumeric<-function(str){
  return (strtoi(gsub(",","",substr(str,2, nchar(str)))))}

for(x in 2:22){
  train[x] <- lapply(train[x], toNumeric)
}

print(train)
```


```{r}
print(summarizeColumns(train))

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = train, aes(x = ï..States, y = Recovery.Zone.Economic.Development.Bond.Allocation)) + geom_point()+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 1, vjust=0.5, angle = 90))
```
